sentences.en: "And now, without further ado, let me introduce our benefactor."
sentences.cn: “下面，闲话少说，让我来介绍一下我们的赞助人。”

sentences.en: "Forgive my manners," she said calmly. "I neglected to introduce myself."
sentences.cn: “请原谅我礼数不周，”她平静地说。“我忘了自我介绍了。”

sentences.en: Allow me to introduce Dr Amberg.
sentences.cn: 请允许我介绍安伯格博士。

sentences.en: Allow me to introduce to you my friend Mr. Thomas.
sentences.cn: 请允许我把我的朋友托马斯先生介绍给你.

sentences.en: Britain did not introduce compulsory primary education until 1880.
sentences.cn: 直到1880年，英国才开始实行初等义务教育。

sentences.en: Emboldened by the wine, he went over to introduce himself to her.
sentences.cn: 他借酒壮胆，走上前去向她作自我介绍。

sentences.en: Have you two been introduced? Tom, this is Greg.
sentences.cn: 有人给你们俩互相介绍了吗？汤姆，这位是格雷格。

sentences.en: He wanted to introduce mature people with leadership qualities.
sentences.cn: 他想引进具有领导素质的成熟人才。

sentences.en: It's my great pleasure to introduce tonight's speaker, Professor Lewis.
sentences.cn: 我很荣幸地介绍今晚的主讲人, 路易斯教授.

sentences.en: Let me introduce Bob, one of the club's stalwart.
sentences.cn: 让我来介绍鲍伯, 俱乐部的忠实拥护者.

sentences.en: Most manufacturers have had to introduce short-time working.
sentences.cn: 大多数制造商不得不推行短工时工作制。

sentences.en: Please allow me to introduce Mr Brown to you.
sentences.cn: 请允许我把布朗先生向你介绍一下.

sentences.en: Several senators introduced legislation aimed at sexual harassment.
sentences.cn: 几位参议员提交了针对性骚扰的立法议案。

sentences.en: The film-makers will be present at the screenings to introduce their works.
sentences.cn: 制作人将出席电影放映礼介绍他们的作品。

sentences.en: The grey squirrel was introduced into Britain from North America.
sentences.cn: 灰松鼠是由北美引入英国的。

sentences.en: The store have introduced a new range of food for children.
sentences.cn: 这家商店推出了一系列新的儿童食品。

sentences.en: They want to introduce a system of identity cards.
sentences.cn: 他们想推行身份证制度。

sentences.en: They will introduce a new washer to the public.
sentences.cn: 他们将向公众推出一种新型洗衣机.

sentences.en: Tim, may I introduce you to my uncle's secretary, Mary Waller?
sentences.cn: 蒂姆，我来介绍一下，这位是我叔叔的秘书玛丽·沃勒。

sentences.en: to introduce a strict import quota on grain
sentences.cn: 严格限制谷物进口量

words.tran_cn: 介绍；引进；采用；入门；传入

trans.tran_cn: 引进，介绍，初次了解，主持，推行，创始，将…提交讨论，添入
trans.tran_en: if you introduce someone to another person, you tell them each other’s names for the first time

trans.tran_cn: 介绍； 引进， 传入； 提出， 提出供讨论； 投放
trans.tran_en: to formally present a possible new law to be discussed
